main event: A possible UFO sighting of a bright silver object described as a satellite occurred on March 2, 1967, in Farming, Michigan.
interesting points: The object was observed moving very slowly and steadily behind trees and branches., The sighting was made in good light conditions at 12:15 PM., The object was described as bright silver or white and glided silently., The observer noted that the object traveled a straight path before taking off vertically in an instant., The object was visible for about 5 minutes before disappearing instantaneously to the North.
sighted object: a bright silver object possibly identified as a satellite
witness description: Civilian observer, details regarding age, marital status, and occupation unclear in the report.
